items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, good fit, not flattering
items.body: Dress was beautiful. Well made with very nice material, fit well. I returned it because it was longish on me and the style kind of made me look like I was in second grade at the Christmas play - maybe it looks more mature on taller people. I am 5'1". I bought a small, could have used an XS Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice classic dress.
items.body: Beautiful classic style dress. Nice comfortable fabric, not thin at all. No need for a slip. Fit as expected for size ordered. Looked quality and more expensive than I paid for it. Read more
items.author: Denise L Sullens

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: Very pleased with this dress. Haven't laundered it or worn it yet, fits and looks great. Hung up after pulling it from shipping and very few wrinkles are visible, so it will travel well, if I ever wanted to take it traveling. Read more
items.author: RKL

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars It was fine
items.body: I am a larger chested gal and it pulled real bad in the arm pits. I wear a medium in everything so I ordered medium. The dress looked great on and was very reasonably priced but it pulled in my armpits and was very uncomfortable after I tried it in. The material could have also been a bit thicker, it was slightly see through in the right light. But the velvet seemed of good quality and it was true to size. I am 5’5” and about 155 and i purchased a medium. It fit everywhere but the chest being too tight. Read more
items.author: Megan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute Dress
items.body: The dress is beautiful on, I just need a smaller size. Read more
items.author: Gwendolyn R Ikner

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Matched what was shown and described 100%
items.body: Fit and finish matched description and sizing, and the fabric feels high quality. Read more
items.author: J B

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous!!
items.body: This dress is gorgeous! I got the green color and got so many compliments. I’m 5’1” 140lbs and the medium fit me perfectly. The length was good too, hit right at my knees. The material was soft and comfortable and I received so many compliments! Read more
items.author: Kay

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Too big and too long
items.body: Dress is oversized and way longer than pictured. Dress goes below knee. Size down!! Read more
items.author: Jesica

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Velvet-black, Velvet-burgundy, Velvet-navy, Velvet-darkred, Velvet-darkgreen. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
